translation.en: I'm down at the Scottish Provident cycle in Crickley.
translation.zh:
我现在在克里克利的
苏格兰普维顿挑战赛现场

translation.en: I'm going to talk to a few of the seven to eight-year-olds.
translation.zh:
接下来我要去采访几个
七到八岁的参赛选手

translation.en: The first person I'm gonna talk to is Mark Turton.
translation.zh: 我要采访的第一位选手是马克·特顿

translation.en: What's the season been like for you?
translation.zh: 你这个赛季表现如何？

translation.en: Quite good.
translation.zh: 挺不错的

translation.en: But I've had a few crashes here and there.
translation.zh: 但我也摔了几次

translation.en: [reporter] Down here we have Joseph Dooley.
translation.zh: 这位小选手叫约瑟夫·杜利

translation.en: He's in the under sixes. Joseph, what are you going--
translation.zh:
他参加的是六岁以下的赛组
对吧 约瑟夫？你打算…

translation.en: No, I'm seven.
translation.zh: 不 我七岁了

translation.en: Oh, you're seven? [laughs]
translation.zh: 你七岁了？

translation.en: Right, now we come to the really fast man.
translation.zh:
好的 接下来我们要采访的
是速度很快的一位选手

translation.en: And he's Mark Cavendish.
translation.zh: 他叫马克·卡文迪什

translation.en: Mark is going to the Scottish Provident Challenge '96.
translation.zh:
马克将会参加
1996年的苏格兰普维顿挑战赛

translation.en: How do you think your form's going, Mark?
translation.zh: 你觉得你的状态如何 马克？

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh:
-挺好的
-那就好

translation.en: How are you going tonight?
translation.zh: 你今晚的表现如何？

translation.en: Okay. I did better than I thought I would.
translation.zh: 挺好的 我表现得比我预料的好

translation.en: -Did you win, or were you second? -No, I was about that far.
translation.zh:
-你得了第一吗 还是第二？
-不 但我就差这么多

translation.en: Christian won, as he keeps saying. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 第一名是克里斯蒂安 他一直在念叨

translation.en: Okay, well, Mark's going to Challenge '96.
translation.zh:
好了 马克将会参加
1996年的挑战赛

translation.en: Thank you. We'll let them get on with the race,
translation.zh: 谢谢你 让我们目送他们去比赛吧

translation.en: they're just about to start and the first line is off.
translation.zh:
他们马上就要开赛了
第一排已经出发了

translation.en: [commentator 1] A world champion at 21.
translation.zh: 他在21岁就成为了世界冠军

translation.en: [commentator 2] Mark Cavendish, youngest British rider to get a stage win at the Tour de France.
translation.zh:
马克·卡文迪什 在环法自行车赛上
拿到赛段冠军的最年轻的英国选手

translation.en: [commentator 3] He is the fastest man in the world right now.
translation.zh:
他是现今世界速度最快的
自行车运动员

translation.en: There's nobody even comparing.
translation.zh: 没人能与他比肩

translation.en: [commentator 1] There's the Missile.
translation.zh: “曼岛飞弹”来了

translation.en: [commentator 2] 70 km/h, what a sprint.
translation.zh: 时速70公里 这个冲刺太快了

translation.en: [commentator 1] He has gotten the victory.
translation.zh: 他拿下胜利

translation.en: No British cyclist has ever been remotely close.
translation.zh:
从未有一位英国自行车运动员
能望其项背

translation.en: Win number 25.
translation.zh: 他拿到了第25个赛段冠军

translation.en: [commentator] Already, he's taken the third most victories
translation.zh:
他年纪轻轻就成为了
环法自行车赛历史上

translation.en: in Tour de France history.
translation.zh: 胜利次数第三多的选手

translation.en: [reporter] From perfection, where do you go?
translation.zh: 你的完美还有上限吗？

translation.en: What a way to stick it to everyone else.
translation.zh: 你可真会在全世界面前拍我马屁

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -Fuck off.
translation.zh: 滚远点

translation.en: Is this live?
translation.zh: 这是直播吗？

translation.en: -[man] Yeah. -Oh, sorry.
translation.zh:
-对
-抱歉

translation.en: [commentator] Cavendish has been disqualified from today's sprint.
translation.zh:
卡文迪什被取消了
参加今天冲刺赛的资格

translation.en: You know that little thing in your mind
translation.zh: 你脑海里有一道声音

translation.en: that says, "I shouldn't really do that."
translation.zh: 在说：“我真的不该这么做”

translation.en: [commentator] Oh, Mark Cavendish is down.
translation.zh: 马克·卡文迪什摔倒了

translation.en: [reporter] Mark, how are you feeling?
translation.zh: 马克 你作何感想？

translation.en: [man 2] We get a lot of questions about Mark Cavendish.
translation.zh:
大家对马克·卡文迪什
有数不清的疑问

translation.en: [man 2] He hasn't got it anymore.
translation.zh: 他的状态已经一去不复返

translation.en: [woman] The harder things got, the less he talked to anyone.
translation.zh:
处境越艰难时
他与其他人的沟通就越少

translation.en: [man 3] Stop cycling and start a different life.
translation.zh: 退役 开启一段全新的生活

translation.en: You don't go from being the best in the world…
translation.zh: 人不能从世界最佳…

translation.en: to nothing.
translation.zh: 沦落到籍籍无名

translation.en: I'd been many years…
translation.zh: 许多年里…

translation.en: just a winning machine.
translation.zh: …我都战无不胜

translation.en: [man in French] The Missile of the Isle of Man, Mark Cavendish.
translation.zh: 曼岛飞弹 马克·卡文迪什

translation.en: [in English] Without the Tour de France, cycling doesn't exist.
translation.zh:
没有环法自行车赛
就没有自行车这项运动

translation.en: Even before I rode the Tour de France,
translation.zh: 在我参加环法自行车赛前

translation.en: I was obsessed with it.
translation.zh: 我就深深地对它着迷了

translation.en: These bike riders suffering all these incredible distances
translation.zh:
参赛的自行车运动员们
要在七月的三个星期内

translation.en: for three weeks in July.
translation.zh: 跨越难以想象的长距离

translation.en: It's addictive. It's…
translation.zh: 这令人上瘾 它…

translation.en: it's savage, but so beautiful.
translation.zh: 它很残酷 但又如此美丽

translation.en: So beautiful.
translation.zh: 太美了

translation.en: We race 21 individual stages
translation.zh: 比赛分为21个赛段

translation.en: over 3,500 kilometers.
translation.zh: 赛程超过3500公里

translation.en: A rider wins one stage of the Tour de France,
translation.zh:
一位车手只要在环法赛上
拿过一个赛段冠军

translation.en: it makes their whole career.
translation.zh: 他的事业就起飞了

translation.en: Not just their year, their whole career.
translation.zh:
不仅是当年的事业
而是整个职业生涯

translation.en: One stage.
translation.zh: 只要一个赛段

translation.en: At this point in my career,
translation.zh: 到我比赛生涯的这个阶段

translation.en: I'd been racing ten years.
translation.zh: 我的赛龄已有十年

translation.en: I'd won 26 stages.
translation.zh: 我拿到了26个赛段冠军

translation.en: [announcer in French] Here is one of the superstar international sprinters,
translation.zh:
他就是国际自行车冲刺赛的
超级巨星之一

translation.en: Mark Cavendish!
translation.zh: 马克·卡文迪什！

translation.en: [Peta Cavendish] It's just like a complete circus.
translation.zh: 比赛现场就像一个马戏团

translation.en: It's carnage.
translation.zh: 混乱不堪

translation.en: [man] That's so cool. All done.
translation.zh: 太酷了 拍好了

translation.en: I try to make it as much as an adventure as I can for the kids.
translation.zh:
我尽力让孩子们把这些经历
当作一次冒险 （皮塔·卡文迪什）

translation.en: When I met Mark, I was a model,
translation.zh: 遇见马克时 我是一名模特

translation.en: and the photographer we were with said,
translation.zh: 同行的摄影师说

translation.en: "Do you know that he's a really good cyclist?"
translation.zh:
“你知道吗？
他是一名很厉害的自行车运动员”

translation.en: And I was like, "Well, brilliant."
translation.zh: 我说：“好吧 真棒”

translation.en: I'd never watched a bike race in my life.
translation.zh: 那时我一场自行车比赛都没看过

translation.en: Cycling's really quite a confusing sport.
translation.zh: 自行车运动是一项不太好理解的运动

translation.en: But I realized what a huge part of Mark's life this was.
translation.zh:
但那时候我知道
这是马克的生活的重要组成部分

translation.en: So if I wanted to understand Mark, I had to understand cycling.
translation.zh:
所以如果我想了解马克
我就必须去了解自行车这项运动

translation.en: You have to have tunnel vision.
translation.zh: 自行车运动员必须要拥有隧道视觉

translation.en: You have to be able to block out all the noise,
translation.zh: 他们必须要有屏蔽一切噪音的能力

translation.en: all the distraction, and focus 100% on what you need.
translation.zh:
屏蔽所有干扰因素
将百分百的注意力放在所需的事物上

translation.en: I had my trusted teammate Bernie Eisel
translation.zh:
我有一位非常可靠的队友
叫伯尼·艾塞尔

translation.en: who'd been with me most of my career.
translation.zh: 他陪伴我走过了大半的职业生涯

translation.en: You put your life in people's hands.
translation.zh: 如果你要把性命交付于他人

translation.en: You have to trust they're gonna give you everything they have.
translation.zh: 那你必须要相信他们会对你竭尽全力

translation.en: You see his emotions and he says he's nervous,
translation.zh:
你要观察他的情绪状态
如果他说他很紧张

translation.en: so the last thing I should be, is to be nervous.
translation.zh: 那么我最不该做的就是紧张

translation.en: We were like a married couple.
translation.zh: 我们就像结了婚的夫妻

translation.en: We have spent probably 180 days per year in a hotel room together.
translation.zh:
我们每年大概有180天
都是一起住在酒店房间里

translation.en: Bernie Eisel.
translation.zh: 伯尼·艾塞尔

translation.en: The best looking man
translation.zh: 是自行车运动

translation.en: in the history
translation.zh: 历史上

translation.en: of cycling.
translation.zh: 最帅的男人

translation.en: We definitely saw each other more than we saw our wives.
translation.zh:
那时我们见对方的频率
绝对比见彼此老婆的频率更高 （前职业自行车运动员
伯尼·艾塞尔）

translation.en: [whispers] Bernie?
translation.zh: 伯尼？

translation.en: Do you think we should get up?
translation.zh: 你觉得我们该起床了吗？

translation.en: [announcer] The race is underway.
translation.zh: 比赛就要开始了

translation.en: 3,535 kilometers between the peloton and Paris in the final.
translation.zh:
现在主车群和巴黎的终点线间
隔着3535公里

translation.en: [Bernie] Cav is a sprinter.
translation.zh: 卡文是冲刺手

translation.en: Paired with athletics, you have a marathon runner.
translation.zh: 在体育运动中 通常分为耐力型选手

translation.en: You have a 100-meter sprinter.
translation.zh: 和百米冲刺型选手

translation.en: Cav has to do both over three and a half weeks.
translation.zh:
卡文要在这三周半的时间内
做到两者兼具

translation.en: You've got 180 best bike riders in the world.
translation.zh:
参加这个比赛的是
全世界顶级的180位自行车运动员

translation.en: Everything's at just another level.
translation.zh: 一切都上升到另一个层面了

translation.en: [commentator] There's been a fall. Contador is down.
translation.zh: 有选手摔倒了 康塔多摔倒了

translation.en: Contador, battered and bruised.
translation.zh: 康塔多伤痕累累 浑身淤青

translation.en: [Peta] The pressure's high. Everyone's nervous. There's often crashes.
translation.zh:
现场让人心惊肉跳
每个人都很紧张 经常有撞车发生

translation.en: Everyone's going to go all guns blazing.
translation.zh: 所有选手都火力全开

translation.en: Everyone wants that chance at the yellow jersey.
translation.zh:
所有人都想一搏
穿上黄色领骑衫的机会

translation.en: [Mark] The yellow jersey is worn by the leader of the race overall.
translation.zh:
只有全赛段总成绩领先的选手
才能穿黄色领骑衫

translation.en: It was really quite rare for a sprinter to be able to get it.
translation.zh: 冲刺手很少会拿到这项荣誉

translation.en: I hadn't worn the yellow jersey at the Tour de France.
translation.zh:
那时候我还没穿过一次
环法赛的黄色领骑衫

translation.en: It's about the only thing I hadn't done.
translation.zh: 那是当时的我唯一没做到的事

translation.en: This year's my chance, you know.
translation.zh: 而那一年就是我的机会

translation.en: [commentator] Mark Cavendish might have a problem here.
translation.zh: 马克·卡文迪什好像遇到了什么问题

translation.en: Fucking prick!
translation.zh: 他妈的王八蛋！

translation.en: Shake of the head as that motorbike went past.
translation.zh: 他朝路过的摩托车摇了摇头

translation.en: Looking for the team car for a bike change.
translation.zh: 他找到车队的车 打算换一辆车

translation.en: Problems for Dimension Data.
translation.zh: 岱凯车队遇到麻烦了

translation.en: Hoping to get Cavendish back to the top of the podium
translation.zh:
希望换车后
卡文迪什能回到领奖台的最高处

translation.en: as a stage winner.
translation.zh: 再度成为赛段冠军

translation.en: [Bernie] My job was always to keep Cav
translation.zh: 我的工作是在比赛中始终确保

translation.en: in a safe spot in the peloton through the whole race.
translation.zh: 卡文在主车群中处在一个安全的位置

translation.en: You have to protect him.
translation.zh: 我必须要保护好他

translation.en: Shelter him from the wind.
translation.zh: 替他挡风

translation.en: Make sure there's nothing that makes him crash.
translation.zh: 确保没有可能导致他摔车的因素

translation.en: Get him to the front, drop him off at 180 meters to go.
translation.zh:
把他护送到主车群前端
送他到终点前180米处

translation.en: The only thing he has to do is head down
translation.zh: 而他要做的唯一的事就是全神贯注

translation.en: and sprint as fast as he can to the finish line.
translation.zh: 以他最快的速度向终点线冲刺

translation.en: [commentator] Going so fast. They're over a kilometer to go now.
translation.zh:
速度真是太快了
他们还剩大约一公里就到终点了

translation.en: And then there was this big, long straight finish slightly uphill.
translation.zh:
最后是一段长且宽的直线公路
稍微有点上坡的坡度

translation.en: But the speed we were doing was phenomenal.
translation.zh: 而我们的速度却前所未有地快

translation.en: [commentator] Cav going towards the sprint finish now, riding at 65 km/h.
translation.zh:
卡文已经开始向终点冲刺
时速达到了65公里

translation.en: There's a big crash just behind!
translation.zh: 后方发生了大规模撞车！

translation.en: Spearing up through the center,
translation.zh: 从车群中心冲出来的

translation.en: it's Peter Sagan. He wants a piece of today as well.
translation.zh:
是彼得·萨根
看来他今天也想争冠

translation.en: [Peta] Mark wasn't really anywhere.
translation.zh: 当时马克并不突出

translation.en: And all you could hear in the commentary was, "Kittel, Kittel, Peter Sagan."
translation.zh:
只能听到解说在喊
“基特尔 彼得·萨根”

translation.en: [commentator] Peter Sagan comes through the line!
translation.zh: 彼得·萨根冲出重围！

translation.en: Peter Sagan, the world champion!
translation.zh: 是世界冠军 彼得·萨根！

translation.en: I was coming,
translation.zh: 我奋力向前冲刺

translation.en: and the line's coming,
translation.zh: 车群也在向前冲刺

translation.en: felt Kittel on my left…
translation.zh: 我感觉到基特尔就在我左边…

translation.en: [commentator] Cavendish comes from absolutely nowhere.
translation.zh: 卡文迪什突然冲到了首位

translation.en: The Manx Missile!
translation.zh: 不愧是曼岛飞弹！

translation.en: Yes! He takes it!
translation.zh: 定了！他是冠军！

translation.en: He gets the yellow jersey! He nails it!
translation.zh: 黄色领骑衫是他的！他当之无愧！

translation.en: -Wow, Mark Cavendish! You beauty! -[cheering]
translation.zh: 哇 马克·卡文迪什！你太棒了！

translation.en: I just remember us all screaming and cheering and Frey bursting into tears
translation.zh:
我记得我们当时都开始尖叫、欢呼
弗雷大哭起来

translation.en: 'cause we'd all screamed so loud
translation.zh: 因为我们喊得太大声了

translation.en: that it scared the absolute life out of him.
translation.zh: 把他吓得六神无主

translation.en: -What a sprint. -Well done, Cavendish!
translation.zh:
-这个冲刺真强
-干得好 卡文迪什！

translation.en: Well done!
translation.zh: 干得漂亮！

translation.en: Good on you, mate. Well done.
translation.zh: 太棒了 哥们 干得漂亮

translation.en: [announcer] Well, he's the center of the world's attention again, Mark Cavendish.
translation.zh:
马克·卡文迪什
再一次成为了全世界的焦点

translation.en: Justifiably so.
translation.zh: 他当之无愧

translation.en: [man in French] It's Mark Cavendish putting the yellow jersey on.
translation.zh:
马克·卡文迪什
将要穿上黄色领骑衫了

translation.en: [Peta in English] It's very rare for the sprinters to wear it.
translation.zh: 很少有冲刺手能穿上这件衣服

translation.en: It isn't normally something that Mark would get the opportunity to go for.
translation.zh: 马克通常很难得到这样的机会

translation.en: [man in French] Look how happy he is.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧他多开心啊

translation.en: He's never worn this jersey,
translation.zh: 此前他从未穿过这件衣服

translation.en: and he's wearing it today.
translation.zh: 今天他终于穿上了

translation.en: [Mark in English] It was incredible.
translation.zh: 那感觉无与伦比

translation.en: This is the most iconic item of clothing in sport.
translation.zh: 那是体育界最具代表性的衣服

translation.en: I'd done everything else I could do, I'd never worn one.
translation.zh:
那时候的我几乎什么奖都拿到了
但从未穿上过它

translation.en: [commentator] This victory moves Cavendish
translation.zh: 这次胜利让卡文迪什

translation.en: one step closer to beating Eddy Merckx's all-time record of stage wins.
translation.zh:
在历来赛段胜次排行榜上
离超越艾迪·莫克斯更近了一步 （环法自行车赛
历来赛段胜次排行榜）

translation.en: [Peta] All of a sudden, everybody starts with this narrative of,
translation.zh: 突然间 所有人都开始谈论

translation.en: "Is Mark going to break Eddy Merckx's record?"
translation.zh:
“马克能打破
艾迪·莫克斯的纪录吗？”

translation.en: [commentator] Mark Cavendish makes it win number 28.
translation.zh:
马克·卡文迪什拿下了
第28个赛段冠军

translation.en: -[indistinct chatter] -I can't believe it!
translation.zh: （卡文迪什 胜次28） 我真是不敢相信！

translation.en: [Bernie] The great Eddy Merckx, I mean, he's just a legend.
translation.zh:
伟大的艾迪·莫克斯
他可是传奇性的人物

translation.en: Breaking the historic record of Eddy Merckx
translation.zh: 打破艾迪·莫克斯的纪录

translation.en: was somewhere in the clouds in our heads.
translation.zh: 简直是不切实际的

translation.en: [commentator] Cavendish gets there!
translation.zh: 卡文迪什第一个到达终点

translation.en: Win number 29. He's closing in on Merckx.
translation.zh:
拿到第29个赛段冠军后
他离莫克斯越发近了 （卡文迪什 胜次29）

translation.en: The thing with Eddy Merckx's record,
translation.zh: 关于打破艾迪·莫克斯的纪录这回事

translation.en: I never started that. That wasn't me.
translation.zh:
我从没这么说过
立下这个壮志的不是我

translation.en: All of a sudden, it's all I'm going for.
translation.zh:
而突然间
所有人都觉得这是我追逐的目标

translation.en: [commentator] Four stage wins this year.
translation.zh: 在今年拿下了四个赛段冠军后

translation.en: Will Cavendish return in 2017
translation.zh:
卡文迪什能否
在2017年回归赛场后

translation.en: and claim that record?
translation.zh: 成为破纪录者？

translation.en: Fuck.
translation.zh: 见鬼

translation.en: [sighs] Like, people had always only talked about Merckx.
translation.zh: 莫克斯可是大家常常说起的传奇人物

translation.en: Now I've got to beat Merckx.
